item.title: Thailand
item.description: Disclaimer: I’m writing this from memory on the last days of my travel, so expected varying levels of detail. Mo 2023-04-17 After an uneventful flight, I arrived in Thailand early in the morning. I took the S1 bus to Khao San Road, the busiest place for back packers in all of SE Asia. On the bus I met a fellow solo traveler, Chloe. We grabbed something to eat nearby and “massively overpaid” (200B ~ 5â‚¬ for a soup), it was still delicious though.
